xwikidoc.name: SecurityAdvisoryApplicationTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status=상태 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_draft=초안 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_completed=완전한 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_announced=발표됨 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_status_disclosed=공개 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_title1=제목 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_title_hint=권고의 제목 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_product=제품 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_product_hint=영향을 받은 제품(예: xwiki-platform, xwiki-rendering, application-change-request 등) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_mavenModules=메이븐 모듈 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_mavenModules_hint=버전 없이 전체 패키지 정의를 사용하는 영향을 받은 Maven 모듈(예: org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-oldcore) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_affectedVersions=영향을 받는 버전 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_affectedVersions_hint=취약점의 영향을 받는 모든 버전(여기에서는 <, <=, > 및 >= 등의 연산자가 허용됨) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_patchedVersions=패치된 버전 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_patchedVersions_hint=패치가 적용된 모든 버전(여기서는 단일 버전만 허용, 운영자는 허용되지 않음) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_advisoryLink=자문 링크 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_advisoryLink_hint=생성된 github 권고사항 링크 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_jiraTickets=지라 티켓 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_jiraTickets_hint=Jira 티켓 목록(티켓 키만 있어야 하며 전체 링크는 없어야 함) SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_computeEmbargo=금수조치를 계산하다 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_computeEmbargo_hint=엠바고 날짜가 버전에서 자동으로 계산되어야 하는지 여부를 정의합니다. SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_embargoDate=금수조치 날짜 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_embargoDate_hint=특정 수출 금지 날짜를 정의하세요. 이는 수출 금지 날짜 계산 플래그가 선택되지 않은 경우에만 고려됩니다. SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_cvss=CVSS 점수 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_cvss_hint=문자열 형식으로 계산된 CVSS의 값입니다. SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_description=설명 SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryApplicationClass_description_hint=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.)
# Sheet keys securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.description=이 페이지는 보기 및 편집 모드 모두에서 보안 권고 응용 프로그램 페이지가 표시되는 방식을 제어합니다. securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.noObject=현재 페이지에는 예상되는 보안 권고 응용 프로그램 개체가 없습니다. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.noFields=The Security Advisory Application application doesn't have any fields to display.
# Live table generic keys ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.title=Page Title ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.name=Page Name ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.space=Space ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.location=Location ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.author=Last Author ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.creator=Creator ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.date=Date ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._avatar=Avatar ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._images=Images ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._attachments=Attachments ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions=Actions ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions.edit=Edit ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable._actions.delete=Delete ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.status=status ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.title1=Title ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.product=product ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.mavenModules=Maven modules ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.affectedVersions=Affected versions ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.patchedVersions=Patched versions ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.advisoryLink=Advisory Link ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.jiraTickets=JIRA Tickets ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.computeEmbargo=compute embargo ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.embargoDate=Embargo date ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.cvss=CVSS Score ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.livetable.description=Description
# Other keys ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.entry.name=Security Advisory Application ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.home.right.warning=The {0}security entry space{1} is currently open to any users: you should restrict its access.
# Configuration ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_embargoDurationUnit=Unit of the duration to use for the embargo computation ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_embargoDurationUnit.hint=The unit is based on ChronoUnit values (e.g. minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, etc) ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_defaultEmbargoDuration=Duration value to use for the embargo computation ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_defaultEmbargoDuration.hint=This value computed with its unit will be added to the date of the latest patched release date for the advisory publication ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_securityGroup=The group of targeted users for advisories notifications ### Missing: SecurityAdvisoryApplication.Code.SecurityAdvisoryConfigurationClass_securityGroup.hint=The users of this group will automatically receive notifications when an advisory is ready to be published.
# Sheet Explanations ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DRAFT=You're currently editing a draft of the advisory. Once it is complete you can mark it as completed with the button on top of the page. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.COMPLETED=Now the advisory is complete, you should announce it to the dedicated channels defined in the security policy. Once the advisory is announced you can switch its status with the button on top of the page. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.ANNOUNCED=This advisory has been announced. It will be automatically marked as disclosable when the embargo date will be reached. It's possible that the embargo date is not yet computed if the patched versions are not released yet. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DISCLOSABLE=This advisory can now be disclosed according to its embargo date. You should request a CVE and publish it. Once done you need to mark it disclosed with the button on top of the page. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.nextstep.DISCLOSED=This advisory has been disclosed and is now public. ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.sheet.severity=Severity
# Deprecated keys ### Missing: securityadvisoryapplication.dataSpace.title=Data
